      • checkElementIndex

        public static int checkElementIndex​(int index,
                                    int size)
        Checks that index is a valid element index into a list, string, or array with the specified size. An element index may range from 0 inclusive to size exclusive. You don't pass the list, string, or array directly; you just pass its size.
        Parameters:
        index - Un √≠ndice
        size - El tama√±o de la lista
        Returns:

      • checkPositionIndex

        public static int checkPositionIndex​(int index,
                                     int size)
        Checks that index is a valid position index into a list, string, or array with the specified size. A position index may range from 0 inclusive to size inclusive. You don't pass the list, string, or array directly; you just pass its size. Returns index.
        Parameters:
